item.title: Yangsiyu Lu
item.description:
Group Lead

Email: yangsiyulu@hkust-gz.edu.cn

Dr. Yangsiyu Lu is an assistant professor at the Carbon Neutrality and Climate Change Thrust and the Innovation, Policy, and Entrepreneurship Thrust. She holds a Ph.D. in Environmental Economics from the University of Oxford, a M.E. in Energy and Environment from IMT Mines Albi (France), and a M.E. and a B.E. in Environmental Science and Engineering from Shanghai Jiao Tong University. Before joining HKUST(GZ), she worked as a research fellow at the Paris School of Economics and Boston University.
